channel.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
channel.description:
K, I need to know 2 things...
1.)How to add a donor crown in my server
2.)How to add a ::givedonor (playername) command which will, give a donor crown beside the player's name.
It's a 317 server, just so you know. :)
Thanks

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @Wafflz Wafflz
item.description:
@Wafflz wrote:

K, got it to work.
Thanks guys

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

Try This.

case 20: // root admin premium = true; break; case 3: // regular admin premium = true; break; case 2: // global mod premium = true; break; case 1: // player moderator premium = true; break; case 4: // just premium premium = true; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = true; // false; //bakatool break; }

Search that in your client.java and add in a like

case 5: // Donator Rights premium = true; break;

So it would look somthing like

case 20: // root admin premium = true; break; case 3: // regular admin premium = true; break; case 2: // global mod premium = true; break; case 1: // player moderator premium = true; break; case 4: // just premium premium = true; break; case 5: // Donator Rights premium = true; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = true; // false; //bakatool break; }

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @dontreadthis dontreadthis
item.description:
@dontreadthis wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“givedonor”) && playerRights >= 3) {
playerRights = 1; //(is this donator’s playerright?, if it is ignore it)
disconnected = true;// (or whatever your disconnect method is i guess)
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

You can make donator whatever the hell you want. But your admin only commands would have to be like:

if(command.startsWith(String) && playerRights >= 2 && playerRights <= 4)

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @ar-temi-s ar-temi-s
item.description:
@ar-temi-s wrote:

I think it’s like The Main one. like on forums Root Administrators are the Owners, the one who can’t be banned demoted etc.

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @Wafflz Wafflz
item.description:
@Wafflz wrote:

k, so it would be

String name = command.substring(int) p.playerRights = 1

and btw, what is a root administrator?

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Wafflz, post:4, topic:283203”]1 = Regular Player
2 = Mod
3 = Admin
4 = Owner
???
So, if this it correct, i would do

String name = command.substring(int) p.playerRights = 2

If I wanted him to only have mod powers?[/quote]
No.

0 = Normal player.
1 = Moderator.
2 = Administrator.
3 = High administrator, or owner, as you guys call it.
4 = Hidden administrator.
20 = Root administrator.

Read full topic

item.title: Little help with Donor Stuff
item.dc:creator: @Wafflz Wafflz
item.description:
@Wafflz wrote:

1 = Regular Player
2 = Mod
3 = Admin
4 = Owner
???
So, if this it correct, i would do

String name = command.substring(int) p.playerRights = 2

If I wanted him to only have mod powers?

Read full topic
